desc: What is the best way to orange-pill certain types of people?

msgs.text: What is the best way to orange-pill certain types of people?

BOOMERS https://twitter.com/awayslice/status/1492290166215651333?s=20&t=9qNf0x2DSLNwhgSD5zhxww Michael Saylor on Tucker Carlson https://www.bitchute.com/video/rUiqtHqvlwiF/?s=09 https://bitcoinmagazine.com/tags/boomers

NO COINERS Talk to them about inflation...How hard it's been to keep up with bills lately. If in US, mention that our current CPI inflation of 7.5% means that in 9 years, half of your purchasing power disappears.
YOUNG KIDS Have them read "Bitcoin Money" children's book. TEENAGERS Ideas: https://twitter.com/bradmillscan/status/1503124501864792081?t=cxCUPRkKax2zs0wjyZMOpQ&s=19
GEN Z Show them Tik Tok accounts like:
RICH FOLKS Their savings are melting away with inflation. Bitcoin is a way to preserve and grow their wealth (annual returns of 100%+ is also better than any stock)
CITIZENS OF AN AUTHORITARIAN REGIME Easiest in my opinion. They need bitcoin the most
SOCIAL JUSTICE For immigrant, Black, Indigenous, LGBTQ+ and other marginalized communities https://www.coindesk.com/layer2/2022/02/16/why-bitcoin-is-a-tool-for-social-justice/
GOLD BUGS Michael Saylor's definitive case for Bitcoin https://youtu.be/oFJym2CKMQ8

A friend of mine made this care package for me to share with a lib friend...

Dem Case: This is new and actually interesting. You know money gets their attention lol: https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2022/03/30/crypto-political-fundraising/
